name: 罗海因·阿罗拉
name_full: 罗海因·阿罗拉 Rohain Arora

last_movies.title: 超人和露易丝 第三季
超人和露易丝 第一季

introduction: Rohain Arora is a Canadian actor, born in Toronto, Ontario.Both of his parents were born and raised in India, Jalandhar. He speaks Hindi fluently.Rohain graduated from Brock University (2010-2014) receiving a Bachelors in Popular Culture and Tyndale University for a Bachelors in Education (2016-2017). Rohain began studying acting with the Toronto Academy of Acting in 2014. Since then Rohain has appeared in Film and Tv projects such as Dare Me (2019), A Grand Romantic Gesture (2019), Surviving Evil(2015).Rohain first received recognition in 2011 as a musician, following the release of his mixtape Acquaintance which garnered over 300,000 viewers on YouTube and led to various performances all across Toronto, St Catharines and London, Ontario.Presently, Rohain is continuing his acting education with Lewis Baumander.
